DOC.brief_summary: This cluster randomize trial compare integration family planning service HIV care treatment program versus standard referral family planning service outside HIV care treatment program within Suba , Kisumu East , Rongo Migori district Nyanza province .
DOC.brief_title: Integrating Family Planning Services Into HIV Care Treatment Nyanza Province , Kenya
DOC.detailed_description: The study three part . During first part ( 3 month ) , baseline data contraceptive prevalence unintended pregnancy collect 18 PSCs support FACES program Suba , Kisumu East , Nyatike , Rongo Migori Districts . Also first part , information knowledge , attitude practice relate family planning obtain patient clinician site . During second part ( 3 month ) , intervention consist integrate family planning service design implemented twelve 18 FACES-supported PSCs . We aim utilize 2:1 integration : control model , delay integration gradually expand integration FP HIV service throughout 18 site , maintain ability test hypotheses effect integration health outcome . After collect baseline data , plan stratify clinic two category base overall patient volume difference structure family plan provision , i.e. , whether specific MCH division provide family plan site . Randomization sit occur among clinic stratum , ratio two intervention site ( integrated model ) one control site ( family planning provide standard manner site ) . During third last part ( 12 month ) , data prevalence effective contraception unintended pregnancy collect 18 site . At end part three , information knowledge , attitude practice relate family planning obtain patient clinician site . In addition , administer questionnaire assess acceptability family planning service patient , addition clinic staff answer questionnaire assess feasibility provide integrate family planning service . After 12 month data collection , 6 control site integrate data collect additional 11 month 18 site assess sustainability intervention Ministry Health . The study population primarily consist HIV-positive men non-pregnant , HIV-positive woman reproductive age obtain care FACES-supported PSCs Suba , Kisumu East , Rongo Migori Districts Nyanza Province , Kenya . In addition , study subject also include clinic staff FACES center include study .
DOC.criteria: For health facility : Each site must provide HIV care treatment service For participant : Women age 1845 , pregnant , HIV+ , receive HIV care health facility Men age 18 , HIV+ , receive HIV care health facility For health facility If meet inclusion criterion list If already provide integrate comprehensive HIV care treatment include onsite family plan counsel provision For participant : Participants exclude meet inclusion criterion list .
